name: Busrapido.com
slogan: The online booking platform for private bus charters
description:
Busrapido.com is a booking platform for private bus charters that makes it easy and affordable to book private buses for traveling in a group.

Today you can book online hotel rooms, flights, car rentals, yachts, private jets, but not private buses. Busrapido has made booking buses online possible for everyone.

On Busrapido users can instantly see prices, reviews, photos, environmental classes, on-board features, and choose the best bus for their trip.

Whether you are planning a wedding, a business event, or a group trip with your friends, Busrapido.com is the right solution for you. We search thousands of vehicles for every trip, and show you the best available options in real time. 
We only work with bus rental companies who meet Busrapido quality standards, so you can rest assured it will be a smooth ride. 

Our team is based in London and Rome, in a sunny office in the heart of Trastevere. 

We are now looking for new software engineers to join the team!

jobs.title: Business Development Manager - UK market
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Business Development Manager to accelerate our sales process by generating new opportunities for our Inside Sales Team.

This is an amazing opportunity to come in and work directly with the founders to develop and execute a sales strategy and operations for a new market we just recently expanded to. You’ll be one of the first sales hires and this will be an incredible opportunity to learn a ton about sales and startups.

This role will primarily be a BDR and Account Manager function. As we are a small team, you will be exposed to every part of the sales process and you will have the opportunity to start closing deals from day 1. 

About the Company
Busrapido.com is a booking platform for private bus charters that makes it easy and affordable to book private buses for traveling in group. Today you can book online hotel rooms, flights, car rentals, yachts, private jets, but not private buses. Busrapido.com has made booking buses online possible for everyone. We are disrupting an industry still powered by emails and phone calls, worth more than $120 billion worldwide.

Expansion Phase
In two years we have moved over 50,000 people, receiving more than € 1,5 million in bookings and creating the largest network of transport companies in Italy and the UK.

Our goal for 2020 is to consolidate our presence on the Italian market and to grow our business in the UK. We will then expand in Spain, Germany, France and other countries. We are expecting to become a very big company, very quickly. We are early on in our journey and want to work with people who can grow with us.

Awards and Prizes
In June 2017, we won the 1st prize of DigithON, one of the most important Italian startup competitions, being awarded with € 10.000 by Confindustria. In July 2017, Busrapido.com was selected by Airbnb for ‘The Journey – Global Tourism Innovators’ Program organised by Beta-i, in Portugal. In December 2017, Busrapido.com was selected by Startupitalia among the top 100 Italian startups of 2017. In June 2018 we won another prize of € 10.000, being selected by the Italian Ministry of Cultural Heritage and Activities and Tourism among the top 10 Italian travel startups of 2018. In January 2019 we made our first small acquisition, making Trasportopersone.it part of the Busrapido group.

What Will You Do
• Make daily contacts with suppliers and clients.
• Be responsible for all the the UK bookings, sending private hire quotations and responding and following up to clients to win more deals.
• Negotiate on rates with suppliers and run quality checks to ensure Busrapido quality standards are met.
• Manage the entire lead generation process, from the collection of contact data to closing deals.
• Generate new opportunities for the sales team through in-depth market research and lead qualification across all sales verticals. 

What will you learn
• How to structure and manage a sales pipeline within a CRM.
• How to set up your sales strategy and operations to win more clients.
• The best way to negotiate rates with suppliers and prices with clients.
• How to use LinkedIn Sales Navigator and other platforms to build a profiled database of qualified leads.
• How to use web scraping tools to collect contact data at scale.
• The power of Chrome extensions and how to multiply your 24 hours by doing twice the things in a single day.

What Busrapido can offer you
• 800€ /month + paid lunches on the days you are working with us
• Limitless personal growth - we pay for conferences and training
• Flexibility in determining weekly schedule of work
• Lots of snacks and drinks
• The unique opportunity to contribute to the international development of a high potential startup
• Working from our cool CoWorking Wcap in the heart of Rome, Trastevere, or our HQ in London.

This is an ideal position if you are a recent graduate or a final year student, you have a significant interest in working in startups and you are interested in learning more about sales, business development and growth hacking.

What We Are Like to Work With
We like to give direct feedback, we will tell you what could be better and we will also tell you what is good. We won’t yell or swear, but we will be brutally honest. If this makes you uncomfortable you’re not going to be happy, so you shouldn’t work with us (I mean, we don’t want to make you unhappy!). If this feels like something you’d prefer, then we’ll probably get along.

The Long Term
We are cool if you’re not our BDR forever, but we want someone who will do this job happily and with great focus for at least 6 months. If you perform well, we would love to turn your internship into a full-time job. In under 12 months you will learn all the skills necessary to become the Head of the Operations Team for the UK market and you'll have the opportunity to manage new team members that will be hired for supporting you as the clients portfolio grows.
Together, we will build a company and if you want to learn what it’s like to run a company then we invite you to come run a company with us.

How Do I Apply
Please email roberto@busrapido.com with your cover letter (e.g. a personal letter from you on why this role would be a meaningful next step in your career and your professional happiness) as well as your resume. If you'd like to stand out, make sure that: 
• You have done some research about Busrapido and signed up to try the product; 
• You include a well-structured and concise message with your application explaining why you find Busrapido interesting and why you'd be a good fit. 

I can’t wait to meet you!

jobs.description:
As a Business Development Intern you'll be responsible for launching and growing Busrapido in a new market. You'll be the driving force of the customer service team, a long-term relationship builder with bus companies across the country and responsible for setting targets and delivering against KPI’s.

This is an amazing opportunity to come in and work directly with the founders to develop and execute a sales strategy and replicate current operations for a new market. You’ll be one of the first sales hires and this will be an incredible opportunity to learn a ton about sales and startups.

This role will primarily be a BDR and Account Manager function. As we are a small team, you will be exposed to every part of the sales process and you will have the opportunity to start closing deals from day 1.

About the Company
Busrapido.com is a booking platform for private bus charters that makes it easy and affordable to book private buses for traveling in group. Today you can book online hotel rooms, flights, car rentals, yachts, private jets, but not private buses. Busrapido.com has made booking buses online possible for everyone. We are disrupting an industry still powered by emails and phone calls, worth more than $120 billion worldwide.

Expansion Phase
In two years we have moved over 50,000 people, receiving more than € 1,5 million in bookings and creating the largest network of transport companies in Italy and the UK.

Our goal for 2020 is to consolidate our presence on the Italian and UK market and to prepare our expansion in Spain, Germany, France and other countries. We are expecting to become a very big company, very quickly. We are early on in our journey and want to work with people who can grow with us.

Awards and Prizes
In June 2017, we won the 1st prize of DigithON, one of the most important Italian startup competitions, being awarded with € 10.000 by Confindustria. In July 2017, Busrapido.com was selected by Airbnb for ‘The Journey – Global Tourism Innovators’ Program organised by Beta-i, in Portugal. In December 2017, Busrapido.com was selected by Startupitalia among the top 100 Italian startups of 2017. In June 2018 we won another prize of € 10.000, being selected by the Italian Ministry of Cultural Heritage and Activities and Tourism among the top 10 Italian travel startups of 2018. In January 2019 we made our first small acquisition, making Trasportopersone.it part of the Busrapido group.

What Will You Do
• Market research: Market analysis; competitor analysis; creating a database of all bus companies; researching and identifying the best bus companies as the first ‘launching partners’.
• Product: Localize current product (i.e. front-end: translation of the websites and communication; back-end: localization of tools so the local bus partners can work with it).
• Customer journey responsibility: manage sales process for local country from quote request to booking (P&L responsibility), sending private hire quotations and responding and following up to clients to win more deals.
• Business development: Make daily contacts with suppliers and clients, negotiate on rates with bus partners and run quality checks to ensure Busrapido quality standards are met.

What will you learn
• How to startup a company in a new market.
• How to structure and manage a sales pipeline within a CRM.
• How to set up your sales strategy and operations to win more clients.
• The best way to negotiate rates with suppliers and prices with clients.
• How to use LinkedIn Sales Navigator and other platforms to build a profiled database of qualified leads.
• How to use web scraping tools to collect contact data at scale.
• The power of Chrome extensions and how to multiply your 24 hours by doing twice the things in a single day.

What Busrapido can offer you
• 800€ /month + paid lunches on the days you are working with us
• Limitless personal growth - we pay for conferences and training
• Flexibility in determining weekly schedule of work
• Lots of snacks and drinks
• The unique opportunity to contribute to the international development of a high potential startup
• Working from our cool CoWorking Wcap in the heart of Rome, Trastevere, or our HQ in London.

This is an ideal position if you are a recent graduate or a final year student, you have a significant interest in working in startups and you are interested in learning more about sales, business development and growth hacking.

What We Are Like to Work With
We like to give direct feedback, we will tell you what could be better and we will also tell you what is good. We won’t yell or swear, but we will be brutally honest. If this makes you uncomfortable you’re not going to be happy, so you shouldn’t work with us (I mean, we don’t want to make you unhappy!). If this feels like something you’d prefer, then we’ll probably get along.

The Long Term
We are cool if you’re not our BDR forever, but we want someone who will do this job happily and with great focus for at least 6 months. If you perform well, we would love to turn your internship into a full-time job. In under 12 months you will learn all the skills necessary to become the Country Manager for the German market and you'll have the opportunity to manage new team members that will be hired for supporting you as the clients portfolio grows.
Together, we will build a company and if you want to learn what it’s like to run a company then we invite you to come run a company with us.

• You have done some research about Busrapido and signed up to try the product;
